snippet.title: Death Remains – Teaser Trailer | Isometric Survival & Hardcore Permadeath
snippet.description:
Enter a ruthless world where every decision could be your last. Death Remains delivers a heart-pounding, isometric survival experience filled with brutal challenges, unforgiving permadeath, and relentless zombie onslaughts. In this teaser trailer, catch a glimpse of a dynamic open world where weather shifts, factions rise and fall, and your survival depends on smart choices—whether scavenging for scarce resources, crafting essential gear, or teaming up in intense multiplayer battles.

Prepare yourself for a survival adventure that tests every instinct and skill. Will you manage to outlast the chaos, or will the dead claim another victim?

Join Our Community:
🔗 Discord: https://discord.gg/hzrrPscTVc
🐦 Twitter: https://x.com/DeathRemainsX
🔥 Steam: Wishlist our Steam page (available Feb 19/20) https://store.steampowered.com/app/2986460/Death_Remains

Subscribe and hit the bell for more updates on Death Remains. Your journey into a world of unforgiving survival starts now!
